intro: Myosotis uniflora, commonly known as the slender forget-me-not, is a herbaceous perennial native to the mountainous regions of Europe and Asia. It features slender, upright stems that bear small, blue or violet flowers with five petals. The plant typically grows to a height of 10–30 cm and produces a single flower per stem, which blooms in late spring to early summer. Its leaves are lance-shaped and arranged alternately along the stem. Myosotis uniflora thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in meadows, woodland edges, and rocky habitats.
